nodes.text: Plympto was a location in the galaxy that following the Battle of Scarif and the dissolution of the Imperial Senate, Colonel Haxen Delto of the intelligence branch of the Rebel Alliance was able to intercept a high priority communique from General Hurst Romodi to Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin via a package on an Imperial satellite near Plympto. The transmission detailed how the data breach led to the theft of the Death Star plans, and that immediate action would be necessary to neutralize political and military unrest.
